subject: p19454978
History: Shortness of breath, evaluation for pulmonary edema.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Mild right pleural effusion. Substantial cardiomegaly with tortuosity of the thoracic aorta. Mild fluid overload. No pneumonia. Minimal areas of atelectasis at both the right and the left bases.
